title: Internship
body:
We are looking for an ambitious intern to help with social media projects and provide account management support.

We are a creative advertising and design agency based within VCCP, a large advertising agency in Victoria.

## The position:

You will work closely with our head of digital who is also account director on some of our accounts.

You will support her on both social media and account management across a variety of clients.

You will learn quickly and expand your knowledge and skills in advertising and design.

## About you:

* You will have a university degree and an interest in advertising
* A highly ambitious individual and a self starter
* Able to work in a fast moving environment
* Keep projects on course and on time
* Excellent planning and organisational skills
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills
* You will be detail-oriented, disciplined and with attention to detail
 
## Why work with us?

* You will gain advertising skills quickly working in a fast paced, small agency
Learn from a talented team.
